resources.string: Eula: This Program was written to help learning and practice Vedic Jyotish. The software is based on the principles learned in Sri Jagannath guru Parampara (http://srijagannath.org/). I hope that this program will be useful to all and in particular to the large number of followers of the SriJagannath Parampara.

The software is free for personal use and may be distributed freely. This software is provided "as-is," without any express or implied warranty. In no event shall the author be held liable for any damages arising from the use of this software.

The software uses Swiss Ephemeris for accurate calculations. The respective copyrights in regards to these files belong to Astrodienst AG and ported to Java by Thomas Mack (http://th-mack.de/) and author is grateful to them for the same.
Upates in this version: First version: Calculate and display chart in South Indian format andVimsottari dasa.

string.name: eulahtml
string.p: Upates in this version: First version: Calculate and display chart in South Indian format andVimsottari dasa.
